data.description: Welcome to this charming tri-level home nestled in the heart of Sterling Heights, where convenience meets comfort. This meticulously maintained home boasts a prime location, offering easy access to schools and shopping, ensuring that every essential amenity is just moments away. As you step inside, you'll be greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere, with an abundance of natural light illuminating the spacious living areas. The main level features a cozy living room, perfect for relaxing evenings with loved ones, while the adjacent dining and kitchen area provides an ideal space for hosting gatherings and celebrations.  Three large bedrooms and full bathroom on the upper level.  The lower level has an additional fourth bedroom, half bath, laundry room and family room. Roof is less than one year old and insulation in attic and crawl less than three years old. Don't miss your chance to make this Sterling Heights gem your new home. Schedule your showing today and experience the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and style!
